attributes.review: First of all, it took FOREVER to download. Then it made my phone super slow. It would show nothing but a white screen on the app when it finally finished downloading. I do not recommend!!!
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: This app promotes the use of hateful behavior, language, and thoughts. This app’s goal is to attain orange supremacy for the trump administration. Furthermore, this app attempts to give anyone not orange no equal rights under the law. These hateful and absurd ideas have no place on the App Store, and that is why it should be deleted.
attributes.title: Against the Constitution

attributes.review: this app is horrible, it froze my phone multiple times. it gave my phone tons of virus’. it took weeks to download, we still don’t have justice for breonna taylor, george floyd, elijah mclain, etc. horrible. 0/10 would NOT recommend.
attributes.title: ew

attributes.review: This app literally almost made me go BLIND. I downloaded this app with a positive and open mind, but once I opened it.. BOOM. The flashing lights of a huge orange circle blinded my eyes. It hurt my eyes SO BAD I was afraid for my eye sight. Please do not download this app, I cannot believe this app is still allowed.
attributes.title: Worst app EVER.
